item.path_to_legends.azure_flute.tooltip: §8A flute that puts out echoing sounds that do not seem to be of this world. No one knows who made it or when.
item.path_to_legends.uxie_claw.tooltip: §8Proof that you have completed the trial set by Uxie, the Being of Knowledge that lives in Lake Acuity. This item is needed to forge the Red Chain.
item.path_to_legends.mesprit_plume.toolt: §8Proof that you have completed the trial set by Mesprit, the Being of Emotion that lives in Lake Verity. This item is needed to forge the Red Chain.
item.path_to_legends.azelf_fang.tooltip: §8Proof that you have completed the trial set by Azelf, the Being of Willpower that lives in Lake Valor. This item is needed to forge the Red Chain.
item.path_to_legends.red_chain.tooltip: §8A mythical chain that is said to link the legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.
item.path_to_legends.light_shard.tooltip: §8Obtained from Dragonspiral Tower. This item is needed to forge the Light Stone.
item.path_to_legends.light_stone.tooltip: §8Reshiram's body was destroyed and changed into this stone. It is said to be waiting for the emergence of a hero.
item.path_to_legends.dark_shard.tooltip: §8Obtained from Dragonspiral Tower. This item is needed to forge the Dark Stone.
item.path_to_legends.dark_stone.tooltip: §8Zekrom's body was destroyed and changed into this stone. It is said to be waiting for the emergence of a hero.
